snippet.title: Jar Battlers Official (first) Trailer
snippet.description:
Jar Battlers is my current project, it is a smash battle game for 2-4 players where you have to get rid of your opponents using jars or bombs, using one of the 16 characters of the game. 
notice that you can also win by a different way : bring enough quartz to the Digital Goddess.

Many features such as game mode (team match or battle royale, infinite respawn or lives count etc...) will be added, Plus special items such as the Genie Lamp, Excalibur or the Dragon Altar are going to be included too

All the graphics are hand-made pixel art to give a retro touch, and sfx/tracks are all 8-bit sounds too to keep safe the legacy ;)

Hope you'll enjoy this game that will be available on steam in the next weeks.
